plot: Gonzo journalist Colton Summers seeks inspiration from 'the gods of writing on high.' He finds it in a chance encounter with a beautiful redheaded girl named Roxy.
title: Redheaded Muse
plot_es: Gonzo journalist Colton Summers seeks inspiration from 'the gods of writing on high.' He finds it in a chance encounter with a beautiful redheaded girl named Roxy.
plot_en: Gonzo journalist Colton Summers seeks inspiration from 'the gods of writing on high.' He finds it in a chance encounter with a beautiful redheaded girl named Roxy.
